20101205014856.000|20101205014857.250|CCO|>> I REMBER A LAWYER ONE DAY,
20101205014857.250|20101205014858.500|CCO|HE PUT HIS HAND ON MY SHOULDER,
20101205014858.500|20101205014859.750|CCO|AND HE SAID TO ME, "ARE YOU

20101205014903.000|20101205014905.000|CCO|BUT NO ONE EVER ASKED ME THAT.
